Package moteur

Class Trophie

  • java.lang.Object
    • moteur.Trophie
  • public class Trophie
extends java.lang.Object
    Given the fact that every card has a "Orange Band" representing the type of the Trophie, we have sepreated that part, defining a type of Trophie. A CardsAJouer has an attribut whose type is a Trophie.

    Class Trophies is a union of cards' orange band, which will be pre-chosen before the game strats. These crads should be present during the running of the game, and once after there was no card in the Stack, every players' cards will be examined to check if one or two of them meet(s) the condition of trophies, if yes, he/she/they will get the corressponding trophie card.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Trophie

        public Trophie​(int type,
               java.lang.String desc)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        type - An integer indicating the type of the trophies :
        1. Highest - Player with highest face value card in this suit.
        2. Lowest - Player with lowest face value card in this suit.
        3. Majority - Player with most cards of this face value.
        4. Joker - Player with the Joker.
        5. Best Jest - Player with highest value Jest.
        6. Best Jest, No Joke - Player with highest value Jest, but without the Joker.
        desc - A String, is the description of the card.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public int getType()
        getter
        Returns:
        the integer representing the type of the Trophie
        1. Highest - Player with highest face value card in this suit.
        2. Lowest - Player with lowest face value card in this suit.
        3. Majority - Player with most cards of this face value.
        4. Joker - Player with the Joker.
        5. Best Jest - Player with highest value Jest.
        6. Best Jest, No Joke - Player with highest value Jest, but without the Joker.

      • Highest

        public Player Highest​(CarteCouleur couleurConditionDemande)
        The FIRST type of the trophy.

        Highest - Player with highest face value card in this suit.

        This methode aimes to find the player who meets this condition.

        Parameters:
        couleurConditionDemande - The color of the trophy, due to the condition of the trophy, the color should be considered while examining each card.
        Returns:
        The player who meets the condition.
